summary: Take your Skyrim to the EXTREME!
descriptionHtml:
If you have a gaming rig that exceeds Skyrim with Ultra settings. Then see if your system is worthy of Skyrim Extreme Settings v7SG.  

There is NO custom lighting, shading, FXAA, injectors or any other MODs. This tweak takes Bethesda\'s Ultra settings and makes them EXTREME! 

=====================================================================================

Features: as of 2/19/12 @ 10AM

 -Main INI generating. Gives you the most optimized INI settings!

 -7 Grid loading, default is 5. Since update 1.3.10.0 w/4G LAA, 7 grid loading is now stable!

 -Quick start, NO MORE Bethesda INTRO!

 -Added interior and exterior buffer to help stability.

 -Increased distant draw of entire environment. See whats in the open world, before it see\'s you!

 -Shadow resolution for primary and secondary set to 4K. Providing the best shadows.

 -Water resolution for primary and secondary set to 1K. Keeps distant water looking good.
 
 -Doubled interior shadow draw distance. Gives indoor shadows more coverage.

 -Disabled Radial Blur for a better look.

 -Disabled Field Depth. Distant haze is gone!

 -Enabled land and tree shadows.

 -Particals reduced to 650 (default 750). Helps performance of indoor areas with to much light.

Map features: as of 1/5/12 @12PM (made possible by IcePenguin)

 -Disabled clouds

 -Clarity tweak to provide cleaner map

=====================================================================================

System Requirements:

 -Skyrim update 1.3.10.0 or higher

 -System MUST be able to run Skyrim with ULTRA settings!

 - 4GB PC RAM and 1GB GPU RAM

 -nVidia GTX460 1GB, Radeon 6850 1GB or higher

NOTE: Files must be manually installed. There is NO NMM.

=====================================================================================

PC :

[IMG]http://i1123.photobucket.com/albums/l550/ThInK192/OCCLogo.png[/IMG]

GPU Specs: 

[IMG]http://i1123.photobucket.com/albums/l550/ThInK192/EVGAGTX4601GBSC.jpg[/IMG] 

Test and Play settings: (Outside 58fps min, Inside 40fps min)
 - 1920 x 1080
 - Full AA and MSAA
 - NO FXAA or Object Fade
 - MODS : Realistic Water, Ehanced Blood, HD Ore and Ingot, Wars in Skyrim, ShadowStripping, 
               SMIM, and Visible Windows.

=====================================================================================

This Skyrim Extreme Settings tweak only improves Bethesda\'s ULTRA settings. 

In no way can these tweaked files effect combat or missions.

=====================================================================================

Please view README 1st before installing!

Compatible with All mods and injectors!

Long live Skyrim!

=====================================================================================

If this tweak proves to much for your PC try Skyrim True Ultra Settings. 

Same great features, but 5 grid loading for lower end rigs.

=====================================================================================

If you want learn how to tweak your INIs without to much work go to:

http://www.geforce.com/Optimize/Guides/the-elder-scrolls-v-skyrim-tweak-guide

=====================================================================================
author: ThInK192
